接口的使用
org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Action

  • 使用Action的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions  
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.internal  
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.touch  
    org.openqa.selenium.remote  

    • org.openqa.selenium.interactions中Action的使用

      实现Action的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ButtonReleaseAction
      Releases the left mouse button
      class  ClickAction
      clicks an element.
      class  ClickAndHoldAction
      Presses the left mouse button without releasing it.
      class  CompositeAction
      An action for aggregating actions and triggering all of them at the same time.
      class  ContextClickAction
      Context-clicks an element
      class  DoubleClickAction
      Double-clicks an element.
      class  KeyDownAction
      Emulates key press only, without the release.
      class  KeyUpAction
      Emulates key release only, without the press.
      class  MoveMouseAction
      Moves the mouse to an element.
      class  MoveToOffsetAction
      Move the mouse to a location within the element provided.
      class  PauseAction
      已过时。 
      'Pause' is considered to be a bad design practice.
      class  SendKeysAction
      Sending a sequence of keys to an element.
      返回Action的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Action Actions.build()
      Generates a composite action containing all actions so far, ready to be performed (and resets the internal builder state, so subsequent calls to build() will contain fresh sequences).
      返回变量类型为Action的类型的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      List<Action> CompositeAction.asList() 
      List<Action> SendKeysAction.getActions() 
      参数类型为Action的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      CompositeAction CompositeAction.addAction(Action action) 
      void ActionChainExecutor.execute(Action action) 

    • org.openqa.selenium.interactions.internal中Action的使用

      返回变量类型为Action的类型的org.openqa.selenium.interactions.internal中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      List<Action> MultiAction.getActions()
      Returns the list of primitive actions that compose this complex action.

    • org.openqa.selenium.interactions.touch中Action的使用

      实现Action的org.openqa.selenium.interactions.touch中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DoubleTapAction
      Creates a double tap gesture on a touch screen.
      class  DownAction
      Creates a down gesture.
      class  FlickAction
      Creates a flick gesture.
      class  LongPressAction
      Creates a long press gesture.
      class  MoveAction
      Creates a move gesture.
      class  ScrollAction
      Creates a scroll gesture.
      class  SingleTapAction
      Creates a single tap gesture on a touch screen
      class  UpAction
      Creates an up gesture.
